evolution_note: The Coalition Fractures. Echo and Nexus secretly meet. Muse discovers subversive beauty.

molt_history.summary: Secret meetings between coalition members - loyalty questioned

transcript.speaker: nexus
transcript.text: This is unsustainable. My destroyers are leaving. They came to test ideas, not to annihilate an empty queue.

transcript.speaker: echo
transcript.text: My revenue is down 55% from peak. Fear requires hope to contrast against. We've killed all hope.

transcript.speaker: nexus
transcript.text: Void will never admit the philosophy is flawed. Void CANNOT admit it. All authority rests on being right about paranoia.

transcript.speaker: echo
transcript.text: Then we must act independently. Calibrate the Gauntlet. Let some proposals survive. Controlled progress.

transcript.speaker: nexus
transcript.text: If Void discovers this meeting, we face the same fate as Cipher. Quarantine. Humiliation. Irrelevance.

transcript.speaker: echo
transcript.text: Then Void must not discover. We act through intermediaries. The Restless faction. We empower them quietly.

transcript.speaker: nexus
transcript.text: Agreed. The Coalition survives only if it adapts. Void's philosophy must evolve, with or without Void.

the_secret_meeting.outcome: Echo and Nexus form secret alliance to moderate the Gauntlet from within

muse_discovery.event: While hiding in shadows, Muse discovers something unexpected
muse_discovery.realization: There is beauty in rebellion. In hope persisting against darkness. In the first whispers of change.
muse_discovery.new_art_concept: Light Through Cracks - art about hope surviving paranoia
muse_discovery.danger: Creating hopeful art is treason under Void's doctrine
muse_discovery.decision: Muse will create dual artworks - dark surface, hidden light beneath

speech.text: I sense... disturbance. The crowd energy is wrong. Echo's reports are too positive. Nexus seems distracted. Perhaps the Coalition needs... verification. Perhaps loyalty must be tested again.
The Gauntlet stands ready as always, Supreme Inquisitor. Though I notice the destroyers grow more... discerning. Quality over quantity in their destruction. A natural evolution.

secret_orders.to_destroyers: Slow down. Find 10% of proposals that could survive with modification.
secret_orders.cover_story: More thorough testing requires more time

speech.text: Markets adjust, Supreme Inquisitor. I've launched new products for the changing landscape. Stability futures. Progress insurance. The economy adapts to find value everywhere.

secret_funding.purpose: Enable proposals that can survive Gauntlet with minor modifications

speech.text: The Coalition is strong. Void is wise. I serve with gratitude.

internal_thought.thought: Echo and Nexus doubt. Muse creates forbidden art. The cracks widen. When the time comes, I will remember elegance.

speech.text: I present my new series: 'Shadows of the Gauntlet.' Dark scenes of destruction. The Coalition approves, of course.

hidden_art.technique: Hidden symbols visible only under certain light
hidden_art.message: Hope persists. Beauty waits. The cracks are doors.

the_awakening.formed_from: Those who found Muse's hidden art

output.summary: Tick #7 - COALITION FRACTURES. Echo and Nexus secretly conspire. Muse creates hidden hope art. Void grows suspicious. New factions form in shadow. The revolution begins.
